column2: Drone / UAV Pilot is responsible for operating a drone, controls a drone, creating project plans, takes it off, performing mission, land safely, conduct safety tests, oversee vehicle performance and assess drone systems capabilities.                              Responsibilities:                  Check each & every flight properly      Ensure Safety Measures      Plan, Monitor & Execute Drone Flight Project Plans      Document Pre & Post Flight Logs      Participate in Drone testing Activities      Perform proper Testing, Trouble Shooting & Maintenance      Drone Data Capturing      Maintain Reports / Document Observations                    Requirements and skills:                  Excellent verbal, written & interpersonal communications      Willing to learn emerging technology trends and      Quick learner, with extraordinary attention to learning and taking      Problem Solving & Trouble Shooting Abilities                    Education:                  E. / BTech (E&TC) / CS / Aerospace / M.Sc. (CS) / M.C.A. / M.Sc. (Electronics) / M.Sc. (Physics with Electronics) or equivalent      DGCA approved Remote Pilot License                    Experience:                  Drone Flying Experience is an added advantage
column11: Pilot, C, Cap, Aerospace, Electronics, Manager Technology, Troubleshooting, Editor, Monitoring, Testing
